name: Bond Chocolate
description: The special chocolate sold by the God of Love from Big Cat Planet on specified day in human's world, the best gift to family and friends. (Effects: you can give this item to NPCs you like or other adventures, Making their All Attributes increase by 12; the effect lasts 30 minutes and is not affected by death and network failure; the valid time cannot stack up.)
